ar.com.hjg.pngj

Class ImageLineByte

  • java.lang.Object
    • ar.com.hjg.pngj.ImageLineByte
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IImageLine, IImageLineArray

    public class ImageLineByte
extends Object
implements IImageLine, IImageLineArray
    Lightweight wrapper for an image scanline, used for read and write.

    This object can be (usually it is) reused while iterating over the image lines.

    See scanline field, to understand the format. Format: byte (one bytes per sample) (for 16bpp the extra byte is placed in an extra array)

      • getScanlineByte

        public byte[] getScanlineByte()
        One byte per sample. This can be used also for 16bpp images, but in this case this loses the less significant 8-bits ; see also getScanlineByte2 and getElem.

      • getScanlineByte2

        only for 16bpp (less significant byte)
        Returns:
        null for less than 16bpp

      • readFromPngRaw

        public void readFromPngRaw(byte[] raw,
                  int len,
                  int offset,
                  int step)
        Description copied from interface: IImageLine
        Extract pixels from a raw unlfilterd PNG row. Len is the total amount of bytes in the array, including the first byte (filter type) Arguments offset and step (0 and 1 for non interlaced) are in PIXELS. It's guaranteed that when step==1 then offset=0 Notice that when step!=1 the data is partial, this method will be called several times Warning: the data in array 'raw' starts at position 0 and has 'len' consecutive bytes. 'offset' and 'step' refer to the pixels in destination
        Specified by:
        readFromPngRaw in interface IImageLine

      • writeToPngRaw

        public void writeToPngRaw(byte[] raw)
        Description copied from interface: IImageLine
        Writes the line to a PNG raw byte array, in the unfiltered PNG format Notice that the first byte is the filter type, you should write it only if you know it.
        Specified by:
        writeToPngRaw in interface IImageLine

      • endReadFromPngRaw

        public void endReadFromPngRaw()
        Description copied from interface: IImageLine
        This is called when the read for the line has been completed (eg for interlaced). It's called exactly once for each line. This is provided in case the class needs to to some postprocessing.
        Specified by:
        endReadFromPngRaw in interface IImageLine

      • getSize

        public int getSize()
        Description copied from interface: IImageLineArray
        length of array (should correspond to samples)

      • getElem

        public int getElem(int i)
        Description copied from interface: IImageLineArray
        Get i-th element of array (for 0 to size-1). The meaning of this is type dependent. For ImageLineInt and ImageLineByte is the sample value.
        Specified by:
        getElem in interface IImageLineArray
